item.description:
DivorceCare is both a weekly support group/seminar for people who are divorced or separated. Talk with people who understand and find ways to heal from the hurt of divorce.

Six to eight of us meet on Thursdays from 6:30- 8:30 pm at Crossroads Childcare Center located at 1301 Edgell Road in Framingham.

13 consecutive Thursday evenings completes one cycle of the curriculum. You can jump in at any point; each discussion stands on its own.

The DivorceCare material is based on a Christian perspective, though people of all faiths and no faith participate in this program.

DivorceCare is NOT a dating environment.

David Hartman: (508)-881-8171 // Email David at Divorcecare@crosscommchurch.org Don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

See ministries page on our website at http://www.crosscommchurch.org Sponsored by Crossroads Community Church
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back; look 4 divorcecare sign, enter through rear door, walk up stairs
item.name: DivorceCare Meetup Topic is Forgiveness
